official_title: A joint resolution to require the Secretary of the Interior to place a plaque at the United States Marine Corps War Memorial honoring Joseph Rosenthal, photographer of the scene depicted by the Memorial.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to have inscribed upon the United States Marine Corps War Memorial (Iwo Jima Statue) the name of Joseph Rosenthal, the photographer of the scene depicted by the memorial. Requires the Secretary to use donated funds to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A joint resolution to require the Secretary of the Interior to place a plaque at the United States Marine Corps War Memorial honoring Joseph Rosenthal, photographer of the scene depicted by the Memorial.
